ch.zhaw.swp2.stegano.controller
Interface IfcUserInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
SteganoGUI
public interface IfcUserInterface

The IfcUserInterface is the Interface, which has to be implemented in any UI. This Interface is used by the Controller Class and provides all basic methods for interaction with the UI.

Author:
Renato Estermann

setListeners

void setListeners(ActionListener runHideStegano,
                  ActionListener runSeekStegano)
This Method is called by the Controller class and sets the ActionListener. On an actionPerformed, the Controller will run the Stegano-Algorithm.

Parameters:
runStegano -

getBaseFile

File getBaseFile()
This Method is called by the Controller to get the BaseFile.

Returns:
is the File BaseFile for the Stegano-Algorithm.

getHiddenFile

File getHiddenFile()
This Method is called by the Controller to get the HiddenFile.

is the File HiddenFile for the Stegano-Algorithm.

getModifiedBaseFile

File getModifiedBaseFile()
This Method is called by the Controller to get the modified BaseFile.

Returns:
is the File BaseFile for the Stegano-Algorithm.

getHiddenFileSaveDir

String getHiddenFileSaveDir()
This Method is called by the Controller to get the HiddenFile Save-directory.

Returns:
is the save-directory for the Stegano-Algorithm. (Where the extracted HiddenFile will be saved)

setBaseFileHexString

void setBaseFileHexString(List<String> inHexString)
                          throws IllegalArgumentException
This Method sets the List with the hexadecimal representation of the values from the Basefile, read by the Stegano-Algorithm, in the user interface.

Parameters:
inHexString - a List with the hexadecimal representation of the read values
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the List is null, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

setModBaseFileHexString

void setModBaseFileHexString(List<String> inHexString)
                             throws IllegalArgumentException
This Method sets the List with the hexadecimal representation of the values, which are written to the modified Basefile, in the user interface.

Parameters:
inHexString - a List with the hexadecimal representation of the read values
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the List is null, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
